attributes.action: Bring awareness to eating disorders into secondary schools in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eating disorders are barely heard about, most people think they are a fad diet or something the disordered choose to do, we need to bring awareness to people so they understand and so the disordered can receive the help they need.
Suffers of other mental illnesses receive help so why don't the sufferers of eating disorders?...
eating disorders effect everyone although the people most likely to be affected tend to be young women, particularly between the ages of 15-25.
awareness in schools will make everyone have more a understanding and knowing the early signs of a eating disorder they can help prevent it and give them the help and support needed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
